verses.name: Isaiah 8:18
verses.text: Behold, I and the children whom the Lord hath given me are for signs and for wonders in Israel from the Lord of hosts, which dwelleth in mount Zion.

verses.name: Isaiah 8:19
verses.text: And when they shall say unto you, Seek unto them that have familiar spirits, and unto wizards that peep, and that mutter: should not a people seek unto their God? for the living to the dead?

verses.name: Isaiah 8:20
verses.text: To the law and to the testimony: if they speak not according to this word, it is because there is no light in them.
